title: Suddenly most apps including google assistant wont open
content: Hello suddenly most of my apps, including google assitant, tips and support option within settings are not working. Apps open everytime just once when I clear cache and restart but then goes into the similar problem again. I am using pixel 5 with the latest android 11. Any inputs or help on this matter would be really appreciated. Thanks.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
